sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>scooter</radical>'s been stolen by a <radical>wolverine</radical>, who's now getting <radical>water</radical> all over it. You need to <kanji>apprehend</kanji> that wolverine!
meaningInfo: Not only did the wolverine steal your scooter, but it is getting your poor scooter all wet by riding it through puddles. Now you and all the cops are chasing the wolverine down on police scooters and you're going to apprehend it!
readingMnemonic: You catch up with the wolverine and <kanji>apprehend</kanji> it by tying it down with the <reading>tie</reading> (<ja>たい</ja>) from around your neck!
readingInfo: It's a really nice tie you use to apprehend the wolverine, so even though it's struggling and fighting, it can't get away.
